commit message:
Small logo asset

Signed-off-by: Jorge Ruesga <jorge@ruesga.com>

Enable move app to external sdcard

Needs some advice about wallpaper resetting to defaults after
reboot/reset

Signed-off-by: Jorge Ruesga <jorge@ruesga.com>

Force to run discover AsyncTask out of the GLThread

AsyncTask can't create a valid handler in ICS (works in JB+), so we
force it to run in a UI thread.

Signed-off-by: Jorge Ruesga <jorge@ruesga.com>

Bump version (1.0.2)

Signed-off-by: Jorge Ruesga <jorge@ruesga.com>
